about_the_game:
Do you like trains?

Automatrain is a top-down, pausable real-time game about building railroads and industry. Manage trains powered by steam, diesel and atomic energy. Construct factories operated by droids, and deploy scout drones to discover new opportunities.

Exploit
Lay track across the map to exploit the world's resources.

Produce
Transport the resources by train to furnaces, factories, refineries, and other industry to produce goods to satisfy the need for expansion.

Manage
Ever increasing expansion will put a strain on traffic, logistics, and fuel consumption. You must overcome these challenges, by using the advanced statistics and automated logistics systems at your disposal.

Consume
The benevolent and wise AI needs these resources to keep balance in the universe. Your efforts will be rewarded with new technology, allowing more advanced transportation and production options. Also trains.

name: Automatrain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Automatrain is a game about building automated railroads and industry, in a world governed by an omnipotent AI. Manage production and traffic to unlock more trains, factories and advanced gameplay features.
